name: Duocube
description:
[GMTK 2021 -  Joint Together] Game:  Duocube
Controls:   LeftMouse  - Select,   WASD - Movement,     SPACE - Jump,  Q -  Switch Focus

This is my first contribution on itch.io and my first time participating at  a gamejam.

The Game is about controlling  two cubes  and trying to  get both of them to the end of the level.

Have fun!
